LiveOnly.label: Only when live
LiveOnly.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

WhoIscmd.label: Command to give twitch account
WhoIscmd.tooltip:
When the bot gets a twitter account, it needs to ask you for its corresponding twitch account.
This is the command in which you give the answer: ![command] [twitter account] [twitch account]

Resetcmd.label: Reset Command
Resetcmd.tooltip: Command to reset who has received points. Needs to be called every time you start streaming

StartUpdatecmd.label: Open CTT Update command
StartUpdatecmd.tooltip:
The script to update CTT list opens automatically. 
However, if you closed it by mistake, and want to reopen it you can use this command.

CTTMsg.label: CTT message
CTTMsg.tooltip:
Message included in Tweet. Script will search for this message on twitter. 
 IMPORTANT: replace any single or double quotes with \' or \" 
 IF CHANGED: RELOAD AFTER SAVING

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission level info
PermissionInfo.tooltip: Set the user, rank or tier for permission

CTTPayout.label: Payout for tweeting
CTTPayout.tooltip: How many points to give the users who tweet

RefreshTime.label: Refresh CTT List time (minutes)
RefreshTime.tooltip:
How often do you want to refresh the CTT List? 
 IF CHANGED: DISABLE AND ENABLE SCRIPT AFTER SAVING

WhoIsMsg.value: Who is {0} from Twitter? Respond by {1} [twitter] [twitch]
WhoIsMsg.label: Who Is message
WhoIsMsg.tooltip:
Sent through twitch whispers. 
{0} = twitter account 
 {1} = Respond command

GetPointsMsg.value: Thank you {0} for tweeting. You have received {1} {2}.
GetPointsMsg.label: Chat Message on CTT

ResetMsg.label: Reset Message
ResetMsg.tooltip: Message sent CTT List has been reset

MentionsOn.label: Receive Twitter Mentions?
MentionsOn.tooltip:
Receive twitter mentions. 
 IF CHANGED: DISABLE AND ENABLE SCRIPT AFTER SAVING

Mention.label: Mention to search for
Mention.tooltip:
Mention or key word/phrase to search for. 
 IF CHANGED: DISABLE AND ENABLE SCRIPT AFTER SAVING
